item.title: How to Create a Brook Server and Client on Ubuntu 20.04
item.author: amyw32@protonmail.com (Amy)
item.description: Introduction Brook is a cross-platform proxy server and client that provides strong encryption and resistance to detection. The design philosopy of Brook is to keep it simple. There are no complicated configuration files, and you can run Brook as a daemon without systemd. In this tutorial you’ll see how to run a Brook server on Ubuntu 20.04 and how to test your server with a Brook client, also running on Ubuntu 20.
